## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using [Instance Name], you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this service.

## 2. User Accounts

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

### Eligibility
- You must be at least 13 years old to use this service (or the minimum age required in your jurisdiction).
- You agree to provide accurate information when creating your account.
- You may not create accounts for automated use without prior approval.

### Account Security
- You are responsible for keeping your password secure.
- You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.
- We reserve the right to suspend accounts that appear compromised.

## 3. Acceptable Use

You agree not to use this service to:

- Post illegal content or engage in illegal activities
- Harass, abuse, or threaten other users
- Impersonate others or spread misinformation
- Distribute spam, malware, or phishing content
- Violate intellectual property rights
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems
- Circumvent rate limits or abuse the API
- Engage in coordinated inauthentic behavior

### Content Standards
- No illegal content (CSAM, terrorism, etc.)
- No harassment or targeted abuse
- No doxxing or sharing private information
- No spam or commercial advertising without permission
- Follow applicable laws in your jurisdiction

## 4. Content Ownership

You retain ownership of content you create and post. By posting content, you grant this instance a license to:

- Store, display, and distribute your content as part of the service
- Federate your public content with other ActivityPub servers
- Create backups and archives for service continuity

### Intellectual Property
- Do not post content you don't have rights to share
- Respect copyright, trademark, and other IP rights
- DMCA takedown requests will be processed according to applicable law

## 5. Moderation

Instance administrators and moderators reserve the right to:

- Remove content that violates these terms
- Suspend or terminate accounts
- Restrict account features
- Block federation with other instances

### Appeals
- Users may appeal moderation decisions by contacting [email/method]
- Appeals are reviewed within [timeframe]
- Final decisions rest with the moderation team

## 6. Federation

This instance participates in the ActivityPub federation network.

### What This Means
- Your public content may be visible to users on other instances
- Once content is federated, we cannot guarantee its complete removal from all servers
- We may block federation with instances that violate our policies

### Remote Content
- Content from other instances is subject to their terms of service
- We are not responsible for content on remote servers
- Report problematic remote content to both us and the origin server

## 7. Service Availability

We strive to maintain service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access.

### Service Changes
- The service may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time
- We will attempt to provide notice of significant changes when possible
- We are not liable for service interruptions or data loss

### Backups
- We perform regular backups, but users should maintain their own copies of important data
- Use the data export feature to download your information
